feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
